23.1.hd_quote: The attempt to undermine one set of values for another.
23.1.behavioral_axis: Builds a base for new ideas by challenging prevailing values.
23.1.shadow_axis: Becomes evangelical or dogmatic; alienates allies.

23.2.hd_quote: The need to abandon tolerance when survival is threatened.
23.2.behavioral_axis: Protects expression when identity/knowing is threatened.
23.2.shadow_axis: Overreacts to critique; confuses disagreement with danger.

23.3.hd_quote: Independent expression that is by its nature not detrimental to others.
23.3.behavioral_axis: Learns to phrase insights so others aren’t threatened.

23.4.hd_quote: Diversification without a perceived potential for synthesis.
23.4.behavioral_axis: Broadcasts disparate knowings with little integration.
23.4.shadow_axis: Anxious, feels rejected; retreats into isolated knowing.

23.5.hd_quote: The practical acceptance of the values of another path.
23.5.behavioral_axis: Adapts language to be received by the collective.
23.5.shadow_axis: Sells out knowing for acceptance and protection.

23.6.hd_quote: The gradual attunement of diversity through synthesis.
23.6.behavioral_axis: Waits until knowings synthesize into a mutative, speakable whole.
23.6.shadow_axis: Holds diversity without synthesis; loses power in expression.
